description: This file defines the implementation of the RialtoConnector class, which manages application sessions, state transitions, and interactions with a server manager service in the Rialto framework. It includes methods for initializing the connector, creating sessions, suspending/resuming/deactivating sessions, handling state changes, and waiting for state transitions.

classes.name: RialtoConnector
classes.description: A class responsible for managing application sessions and their states within the Rialto framework.

methods.name: void initialize()
methods.description: Initializes the Rialto connector, setting up the server manager service and configuration.

methods.name: bool createAppSession(const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Creates a new application session with specified callsign, display name, and app ID.

methods.name: bool resumeSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Resumes an application session identified by callsign if it is inactive.

methods.name: bool suspendSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Suspends an application session identified by callsign if it is active.

methods.name: const RialtoServerStates getCurrentAppState(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the application identified by callsign.

methods.name: bool deactivateSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Deactivates (sets to NOT_RUNNING) an application session if it is currently active or inactive.

methods.name: void stateChanged(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state)
methods.description: Handles and records a change in the app's state, notifying waiting threads.

methods.name: bool waitForStateChange(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state,int timeoutMillis)
methods.description: Waits for the application to reach a specified state within a timeout period.

ctags.name: createAppSession
ctags.signature: (const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)

ctags.name: waitForStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^    bool RialtoConnector::waitForStateChange(const std::string& appId, const RialtoServerStates&/
